path.style: fill: rgb(255, 73, 69); fill-opacity: 1; fill-rule: evenodd; stroke: black; stroke-width: 0.886228; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1;

opacity: 1; fill: rgb(20, 17, 200); fill-opacity: 1; fill-rule: nonzero; stroke: rgb(20, 17, 200); stroke-width: 0pt; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-dashoffset: 0pt; stroke-opacity: 1;
